titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Special Committee on Aging.

calendar.text: Committee on Aging ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Aging. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Smith. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/31/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Special Committee on Aging for the 109th Congress.
